examples.text: Do you know who you are?
I want to set up the chat bot for my shop
What should I know about you?
Can you please give me a list of the types of things you can help me with?
Can you tell me what services you are able to help me with?
Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?
How can you solve my problems?
I'd like to know what type of questions you can answer for me.
I do not know what to ask
Is there anything you can help me with?
Tell me about what kind of things you do?
What are my options that you can help with?
What are you able to deal with?
What are you able to understand?
What can I ask you to do?
What else can you help me with?
What kinds of things can you do?
Where can I find the frequently asked questions?
Can I connect to an agent?
Can I speak to a human please?
Can I speak to a live person?
Can I speak to an advisor?
Can you assist me to connect to an agent?
Can you connect me with a real person?
Connect me to a live operator please.
Could you please transfer me to your master?
How can I skip the recorded menu and go straight to a live person?
I don't want to talk to a bot.
I don't want to talk to you
I need to speak to a representative. How would I go about doing so?
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
I want an agent to help me
I want to talk to a person
I would like to speak to a human
I would like to speak to someone
Please assist me to get to an agent
Please connect me to a live agent
Please let me talk to a human being.
Yes, take me to a real person
I d like to stop doing this
It was nice chatting with you
Hello I am looking for some help here
Am I chatting with a human?
Am I talking to a Bot?
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Are you a human or a bot?
How can you prove you are a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?
Can't believe you are that good
I like what you did there! :)
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
You gave me exactly what I need!
Can I be sure that my stored card details are held securely?
Do you have protection against hacks?
How do I know if my card info is kept safe?
How do I know this chat is not a scam?
How is my credit card info secured?
I'd like proof of a secure chat
In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
Is there a reason to distrust this chat?
Is this a trusted chat site?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?
Why would I trust this chat?

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

examples.text: Please define Oyster Omelette / Orh Lua

intents.description: Able to provide information to the users for variety of local food.

values.text: Thank you for using Makan Bot. Please proceed to Grab food link below to raise your order. Place your order here

generic.title: Roti Prata
generic.description: Roti Prata is a flaky Indian bread made with or without eggs and served with a thick vegetable based lentil curry.

generic.title: Nasi Briyani
generic.description: Chichen Biryani Chicken Biryani is a delicious savory rice dish that is loaded with spicy marinated chicken, caramelized onions, and flavorful saffron rice.

generic.title: Thosai
generic.description: Thosai is a savoury pancake served with a slew of spicy dipping sauces. Like so much of the Indian food popular at Singapore hawker centres, thosai are cheap, tasty and 100% vegetarian.

generic.title: Cheng Tng
generic.description: Cheng tng, meaning clear soup, is a traditional Singaporean sweet treat that is commonly enjoyed as a dessert.

generic.title: Cendol
generic.description: Cendol is an iced sweet dessert that contains droplets of green rice flour jelly, coconut milk and palm sugar syrup

generic.title: Back to main page
generic.description: Click on order to place food order

values.text: Thank you for using Makan Bot. See you again and enjoy your meal. Bye!

generic.title: Satay
generic.description: Satay is small pieces of spice marinated meat (usually lamb, beef, chicken) skewered with a thin wooden stick cooked by grilling over a trough of open charcoal fire.

generic.title: Rendang
generic.description: It is a delicious Indonesian dish prepared with a myriad of herbs and spices cooking for a few hours until all the liquids have been completely absorbed by the meat.

generic.title: Nasi Lemak
generic.description: Nasi lemak is a hearty meal comprising coconut rice, a slice of omelette, anchovies, a slice of cucumber and some chilli paste, uniquely packed in brown paper or banana leaf.

generic.title: Chicken Rice
generic.description: The Hainanese chicken rice is a dish that consists of succulent steamed white chicken cut into bite-size pieces and served on fragrant rice with some light soy sauce.

generic.title: Char Kway Teow
generic.description: Broad white noodles fried with black Soya sauce, bean sprouts, fish cake, clams and Chinese sausage. You will find this dish in hawker centres and restaurants. Skilled chefs will add a smoky taste to the dish by cooking the noodles at a high temperature.

generic.title: Chilli Crab
generic.description: Hard-shell crabs cooked in semi-thick gravy with a tomato chilli base. The steamed crabs are partially cracked, then lightly stir-fried in a paste comprising of chilli sauce, ketchup and eggs. Despite its name, Chilli Crab is not all that spicy.

values.text: I am not quite sure about the term @object_of_interest . Please try another topic.

generic.title: back to main
generic.description: Click on order to place food order

values.text: Hi! Im a Makan Bot virtual assistant. How can I help you today?

options.label: I am looking for main meal
